body: Marko Phiri posts a picture of Bulawayo water on the morning of 5 February 2011. He says, "Try drinking that!"
original_body: Marko Phiri posts a picture of Bulawayo water on the morning of 5 February 2011. He says, "Try drinking that!"
title: Zimbabwe: Try drinking this water!

sentence: Marko Phiri posts a picture of Bulawayo water on the morning of 5 February 2011.
